projects.name: Tree Visualization
projects.description: App that allows users to create, save, and edit virtual trees that are grown differently based on environmental properties like weather, soil, etc.

projects.name: Personal Site
projects.description: A personal site that outlines projects, experiences, and information pertaining to me. Stores info in JSON to easily update the site.

projects.name: Rate My Professor Query Engine (on hold)
projects.description: Query engine that searches through scraped data from ratemyprofessors.com and provides more informative data regarding each professor.

projects.name: Dead Roads (Film)
projects.description: A short film made for Art 609 at Phillips Academy that follows a boy's path to revenge. Deals with topics such as fatherhood, responsibility, and false justice.

projects.name: Binary Tree Simulator
projects.description: App that holds a shared binary tree that stores node information (parent, children, content) and presents them to the user in an interactive manner.

projects.name: Randomized Algorithms
projects.description: A paper-coding project that focuses on research done on the concept of non-deterministic algorithms and how they compare to their deterministic counterparts.

projects.name: Polynomials, Roots, and Galois: Introductions
projects.description: A paper written for Math 630 at Phillips Academy that focuses on history's quest to find roots of polynomials while using Galois Theory and group theory to make more rigorous claims.
